mapper.insert: INSERT INTO donation(donaNum, donaType, donaGroup, donaPrice, donaStart, donaEnd, donaState, mId) VALUES (#{#donaNum}, #{donaType}, #{donaGroup}, #{donaPrice}, #{donaStart}, #{donaEnd}, #{donaState}, #{mId})
mapper.select: SELECT m.mId, mName FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN memberDetail m2 ON m.mId = m2.mId WHERE m.mId=#{mId}
